title: Implement Email Sending Functionality
description: Replace the placeholder in handleSendEmail with actual logic to send emails to practices, possibly integrating with an email service or backend API.

title: Add Success/Error Feedback for Email Sending
description: Show user feedback (e.g., toast notifications) when an email is sent successfully or if there is an error.

title: Add Practice Details Columns
description: Expand the table to include more practice details (e.g., phone number, address) if available in the database.

title: Add Search and Filter Functionality
description: Allow users to search and filter practices by name, email, or other fields for easier management.

title: Paginate Practices Table
description: Implement pagination for the practices table to handle large datasets efficiently.

title: Loading and Error State Improvements
description: Enhance the UI/UX for loading and error states, possibly with spinners or more detailed error messages.

title: Unit and Integration Tests
description: Write tests for the Outbound component to ensure data fetching, rendering, and email sending work as expected.
